doc.name: DebuggerParameter
doc.description: A parameter that represents a debugger for event debugging. It receives debugging messages from the events at the current level of the model hierarchy, and also the levels below if the hierarchical parameter is set to true.
doc.author: Thomas Huining Feng
doc.property: The horizontal size of the display, in columns. This contains an integer, and defaults to 40.
Whether debugging messages from lower levels of the model hierarchy should be displayed.
The mode of this debugger, which is either "check log", "display", or "record log".
The vertical size of the display, in rows. This contains an integer, and defaults to 10.
